text: Gumazitam, God ganɨngizir ofa gamir asɨzir tuzitam inigh, uan korotiamɨn aven anerugh mangɨtɨ, an korotiar otevitam bretɨn tam o, dagher isamiziba o, wain o, olivɨn borem o, dagher guar igharagha garitam uaghan a seregh mangɨtɨ, dagher kam God baghvɨra ikɨ bar anogoregham o puvatɨgham?” Ezɨ Hagai ghua ofa gamir gumazibar azarazɨ me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Mamaghɨn puvatɨgham.”2:12 Nɨ Ofa Gami 6:25-27ɨn ganigh.
